Class TargetTreeDropTransferHandler

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.tree.TreeDefaultDropTransferHandler
      gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.map.TargetTreeDropTransferHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
HL7SDKDropCompatibleComponent
public class TargetTreeDropTransferHandler
extends TreeDefaultDropTransferHandler

This class handles drop-related data manipulation for target tree on the mapping panel.

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:24 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $

isDropOk

public boolean isDropOk(java.awt.dnd.DropTargetDragEvent e)
Called by the DropTargetAdapter in dragEnter, dragOver and dragActionChanged. Current implementation only accept DefaultSourceTreeNode as the possible transferable data. In future, if on the manipulation of Target Tree itself, please sub this class.
